ValidationRule.description: Case = Account Management. If Related to = Create Account, address fields are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (RecordType.Name = "Account Management", ISPICKVAL( Related_To2__c ,"Create Company"), OR( ISBLANK( Create_Account_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Account_Phone__c ), ISBLANK( Street_Address__c ), ISPICKVAL( CAP_State__c ,""), ISBLANK( City__c ), ISBLANK( Zip_Code__c )
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Name, Account Phone, Street Address, City, State and Zip Code are required.
